item.title: Plot Missing Values
item.description: In one of DataCampâ€™s courses that I cannot remember at the moment, the instructor used geom_tile from ggplot2 package to visualize missing values. It was something like this. airquality ## Ozone Solar.R Wind Temp Month Day ## 1 41 190 7.4 67 5 1 ## 2 36 118 8.0 72 5 2 ## 3 12 149 12.6 74 5 3 ## 4 18 313 11.5 62 5 4 ## 5 NA NA 14.
